item.title: Families of Camp Mystic campers, counselors who died in Texas flood file lawsuits
item.description: The families of multiple campers and two counselors who died in the devastating flash flood on July 4 are plaintiffs in the lawsuits.

item.title: Government shutdown updates: Senate passes government funding bill
item.description: The Senate on Monday passed a bill that will fund the government through Jan. 30. It now goes to the House where a vote could come as early as Wednesd...

item.title: WATCH: House Speaker Mike Johnson gives timeline to end shutdown
item.description: Johnson on Monday laid out a timeline for what's next after the Senate advanced a short-term funding bill on Sunday, saying he will call the House bac...

item.title: Stocks close higher after Senate moves to end government shutdown
item.description: The Senate voted Sunday night in support of a potential agreement.

item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
